extension.summary: Browse and watch Cisco Live on-demand sessions
extension.description: Browse the full Cisco Live on-demand library with 14,000+ technical sessions from 2018-2026. Filter by event, technology, technical level, or search by keyword. Features watch history tracking and multi-select filtering. Streams sessions directly via the RainFocus catalog API and Brightcove video platform. All videos are freely accessible without authentication.
extension.news: v2.1.0 - Removed authentication requirement, all videos are freely accessible.
